sentence.Network_en: Esau sold his birthright to Jacob for a mess of pottage.

sentence.Network_en: A nice mess of pottage was served at the beginning.
sentence.Network_cn: 先上的是份不错的浓汤.

sentence.Network_en: I know him not should I meet him in my pottage dish.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English (as potage): from Old French potage 'that which is put into a pot'. Compare with potage and porridge
